3.name: Combat Superiority
3.description: You learn maneuvers that are fueled by special dice called superiority dice.

3.name: Student of War
3.description: You gain proficiency with one type of artisan's tools of your choice.

7.name: Know Your Enemy
7.description: If you spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with another creature outside combat, you can learn certain information about its capabilities.

10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
10.description: Your superiority dice turn into d10s.

15.name: Relentless
15.description: When you roll initiative and have no superiority dice remaining, you regain 1 superiority die.

18.name: Improved Combat Superiority
18.description: Your superiority dice turn into d12s.

3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
3.description: You gain proficiency with the disguise kit and the poisoner's kit.

3.name: Assassinate
3.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn in the combat yet.

9.name: Infiltration Expertise
9.description: You can unfailingly create false identities for yourself.

13.name: Impostor
13.description: You gain the ability to unerringly mimic another person's speech, writing, and behavior.

17.name: Death Strike
17.description: You become a master of instant death.

3.name: Hunter's Prey
3.description: You gain one of the following features of your choice: Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker.

7.name: Defensive Tactics
7.description: You gain one of the following features of your choice: Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will.

11.name: Multiattack
11.description: You gain one of the following features of your choice: Volley or Whirlwind Attack.

15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
15.description: You gain one of the following features of your choice: Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge.
